name: ShipShip
description:
This is my submission for the 8th 9DayJam. Our theme was "simple", and whats not more simple (see what I did there lol) then a typical take on the Space Invaders theme. I am a first year in Game Programming at Humber College. I do not have much experience with building assets and material from scratch, so most of my assets are publicly free and available from the Epic Games market content. A lot of tutorial videos were watched about how to use Unreal Engine 4 and this is my final product. I hope you enjoy.

Controls:
WASD: Movement
LMB / RMB: Primary & Secondary Fire modes

Basis:
- An endless survival with waves of alien spacecraft
- Collect points by defeating enemies
- Lose points by being hit or hitting red asteroids
- See how long you can last

Game takes some getting use too, the explosions and negative points punishments can effect player performance a lot.
